channel.title: Blog - Frames
channel.description: Discover film photography guides, shooting tips, camera reviews, analog workflow advice, and practical ways to use the Frames app to enhance your photography.

item.title: Best New Film Cameras in 2025: What You Can Actually Buy
item.description: Film photography is still alive in 2025. From Pentax and Leica to Lomography and new startups, here are the film cameras you can actually buy brand new today.
item.dc:creator: Vincent Tantardini
